name: Arpen Lad
title: Software Engineer
bio: Hi! I am a Arpen Lad, Software Engineer with 5.5 years of experience in designing and developing full stack systems using Java, Spring Boot, and Node.js. I began my career at Thermofisher scintific, where I worked for 4.5 years as a full stack webdeveloper, where I worked on both Java springboot and Node js UI with express and handle bars framework.Currently, I’m working at Vantive health care, where I focus on building robust solutions using Java and Spring.

My experience spans building microservices, deploying with Docker, and leveraging AWS for cloud infrastructure. I’m passionate about writing clean, maintainable code and solving real-world problems through efficient software design.
